Denver, Colorado

November 22, 2017
After Austin we went to Colorado, where spent a couple of days in Denver.

They have a free bus running on the main street here, taking people from one mall to another.

Christmass market, almost like in Germany.

Walk around an empty prak.

Met some well-fed squirells here.

In Denver we visited botanical garden as well.

There are christmass lights all over the trees and bushes.

Japanese garden, but it's not very exciting for us 😀

Someone has a memorial bench in the garden.

Modern art.

From Denver we went to Rocky Mountains, in a town called Estes-Park.
The nature is great here and deers are walking just in fron of the houses.
